colla.kernel.api

Interface CollAMessage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ACK, ACK, ACK, AskToCreateGroupMsg, CancelTask, ChatDirectMessageMsg, ClientSignUpMsg, CreateGroupAnswerMsg, CreateGroupMsg, DeveloperViewerDisconnectMsg, DeveloperViewerLoginAnswerMsg, DeveloperViewerLoginMsg, DownloadResultMsg, GetAvailableHostsMsg, GetGroupsAnswerMsg, GetGroupsMsg, GetHostMsg, HostDisconnectMsg, HostLoginMsg, HostRegisterMsg, HostUpdateMsg, JoinAGroupAnswerMsg, JoinAGroupMsg, MapConnection, NotifyTaskStarted, Ping, Ping, PingClientMsg, Pong, RetrieveStoredResultsMsg, SendAvailableHostsMsg, SendOwnedHostsMsg, SendStoredResultsMsg, ServerHostLoginAnswer, ServerHostRegisterAnswerMsg, SignUpAnswerMsg, TaskMessage, TaskResultMsg, TransmitChatMsg, TransmitResultMsg, TransmitStartNotification, TransmitTaskMsg, UpdateGroupsMsg, UpdateUserMsg

    public interface CollAMessage
    Messages are the way to communicate with servers, hosts and users. A message should carry an identifier of the operation to be carried out at the destination. Objects carried by a message must implement Serializable.
    Author:
    Diogo Matos

      java.lang.Enum getOperation() 

    • Method Detail

      • getOperation

        java.lang.Enum getOperation()
        Returns:
        an Enum representing the operation to be performed by the receiver
